```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(rgdal)
```

```{r}
mydat = rgdal::readOGR("./data/UHF_42_DOHMH.shp")
plot(mydat)
names(mydat)
mydat$UHF

mydat@data

mymap = ggplot(data = fortify(mydat)) +
    geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = ), colour = "black",
                 fill = NA) +
    theme_grey()
print(mymap + coord_map())
fortify(mydat)
```
